<h3 id="X36538">X(36538)&nbsp;=&nbsp; HOMOTHETOR OF THESE TRIANGLES: T((bc+ca+ab)/(a^2+b^2+c^2)) AND ORTHIC OF INTOUCH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (a + b - c)*(a - b + c)*(a^3 - 2*a*b*c - b^2*c - b*c^2) : :
<p>
